channel.title: Hoster Needed
channel.description:
Hey guys. If any Moderators find this is in the wrong section, please move it rather than lock it :) .
Here we go anyways. Seen as though I want to work on a new server, and don't have time for running mine, I'd like a nice person ;) to simply run my server. I'll send you my source, and grant you Adminship to my server as a token of my appreciation. When I do hand over my server, I hope I don't see the hoster abusing the powers. That's all ;) .
Thanks.
